name: Muddy Water
description: Questionable liquid from a stagnant pond. Might quench thirst, might cause illness. Desperation makes people do strange things.

name: Weak Healing Salve
description: A crude mixture of herbs and mud. Provides minimal healing but might prevent infection. Tastes like it was made in a goblin's boot.

name: Minor Health Potion
description: A basic red potion that restores a small amount of vitality. Standard fare for novice adventurers and town militia.

name: Healing Draught
description: A well-brewed potion with a pleasant herbal taste. Provides moderate healing and is trusted by experienced warriors.

name: Greater Healing Elixir
description: A potent healing potion that glows with inner warmth. Can mend broken bones and close deep wounds. A lifesaver in desperate situations.

name: Elixir of Vigor
description: An enchanted potion that not only heals wounds but also temporarily enhances physical capabilities. The liquid shimmers with magical energy.

name: Phoenix Tears
description: A legendary healing potion made from the tears of a phoenix. Can bring someone back from the brink of death and burns away poison and disease.

name: Nectar of Immortality
description: A divine elixir that grants temporary immortality. For one day, the drinker cannot die, though they may still suffer pain and injury. Extremely rare.

name: Essence of Life
description: Pure life force distilled into liquid form. Can resurrect the recently dead and restore youth to the aged. Wars have been fought over single vials.

name: Philosopher's Panacea
description: The ultimate alchemical achievement. This golden elixir can cure any ailment, grant eternal youth, and even restore lost souls. Only one has ever been successfully created.
